forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun casts its warm glow over Downtown San Francisco, the city emerges in a tapestry of soft blues and golds. The air is filled with a gentle energy; winds from the west southwest dance around at nearly 18 mph, punctuating the bright clarity of the day. Temperatures, although nudging upwards toward a pleasant 71, will soften to a more comfortable 68 as the hours slip into evening. The skies remain remarkably clear, free from the familiar fog that often hugs the coastline, instead revealing a breathtaking view that stretches toward the Golden Gate Bridge and beyond.

Tonight promises a soothing transition under a blanket of stars as the temperature settles around 57. A lingering breeze will offer just enough coolness, inviting the option of light layers—a cardigan or a thin jacket might be best, making it perfect for an evening walk along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet dinner at an outdoor café, where the beauty of the evening sky can be savored in tandem with good food and company. Such a day is ripe for exploration, urging one to collect moments rather than simply witness them. With the absence of fog and the splendor of a vibrant summer afternoon, it is surely a time to relish in the simple pleasures that city life offers.
